property.name: Rules
property.value: Coven - At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. Then if you control three or more creatures with different powers, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She keeps the festival's revels from faltering, infusing the witches' rituals with hope.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another Zombie you control dies, if it didn't have decayed, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a Zombie. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature you control dies, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you sacrifice a token, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Kyler, Sigardian Emissary. Other Humans you control get +1/+1 for each counter on Kyler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even when the angels succumbed to madness, Sigarda stood strong. She is hope."

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each different power among creatures on the battlefield, choose a creature with that power. Destroy each creature not chosen this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was going to suggest silver, but a beam of pure angelic fury works even better." - Rem Karolus, Fiendslayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Nonlegendary creatures enchanted player controls have base power and toughness 3/3 and lose all creature types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether you'll fit in isn't up to you at all.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Moorland Rescuer dies, return any number of other creature cards with total power X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is Moorland Rescuer's power. Exile Moorland Rescuer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold on tight, little one. I'll get you to safety."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying Whenever Sigarda's Vanguard enters the battlefield or attacks, choose any number of creatures with different powers. Those creatures gain double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Coven - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Wall of Mourning enters the battlefield, exile a card from the top of your library face down for each opponent you have. Coven - At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, put a card exiled with Wall of Mourning into its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice another Zombie: Create two tokens that are copies of the sacrificed creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Furious and unable to separate, the bitter rivals consoled themselves by splitting everything else they saw in half.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control. That player puts the rest of the revealed cards into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both instead. • Target player draws X cards. • Target player mills twice X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within our minds are limitless depths. Dive down, but don't forget to surface." - Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice X Zombies, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a number of Zombie creature cards equal to the number of Zombies sacrificed this way. Put those cards onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other Zombies you control have flying. Whenever one or more Zombies you control deal combat damage to one or more of your opponents, you may draw cards equal to the number of opponents dealt damage this way. If you do, discard that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash At the beginning of your upkeep, each player mills three cards. You may exile a creature card from among the cards milled this way. If you do, Shadow Kin becomes a copy of that card, except it has this ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {B}. Whenever a creature you control dies, put a corpse counter on Crowded Crypt. {4}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Crowded Crypt: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed for each corpse counter on Crowded Crypt. (A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever a land enters the battlefield under enchanted player's control, you create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each player, choose a creature card in that player's graveyard. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control. They're black Zombies in addition to their other colors and types and they gain decayed. (A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card exiled this way. Deathtouch Whenever Gorex, the Tombshell attacks or dies, choose a card at random exiled with Gorex and put that card into its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you sacrifice another creature, exile it. If that creature was a token, put a +1/+1 counter on Prowling Geistcatcher. When Prowling Geistcatcher leaves the battlefield, return each card exiled with it to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ravenous Rotbelly enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice up to three Zombies. When you sacrifice one or more Zombies this way, each opponent sacrifices that many creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The patrol found the graf empty save for a few well-chewed bones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Zombies you control get +1/+1. {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return a Zombie creature card at random from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your turn and only if there are at least three Zombie creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of different powers among creatures you control. Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Harvesttide dance is one of joyous abandon, a last revel before winter nights.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever a nontoken creature enchanted player controls dies, exile it and you create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Clare realized too late why no one ever took the shortcut through the abandoned mill.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Heronblade Elite. {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is Heronblade Elite's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kurbis, Harvest Celebrant enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of mana spent to cast it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Kurbis: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to another target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target artifact or enchantment. Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the mana value of the permanent exiled this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gourd carving was supposed to take place after the feast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose any number of creatures with different powers. Each of them gets +X/+X and gains vigilance until end of turn, where X is Sigardian Zealot's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We fight together! In Sigarda's name, ready your weapons!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Somberwald Beastmaster enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, a 3/3 green Beast creature token, and a 4/4 green Beast creature token. Creature tokens you control have deathtouch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible Other legendary permanents you control have indestructible.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They had no marble, so the faithful repaired her likeness with wood, straw, twine, and clay.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 1/1 white Human creature token for each creature you control. Flashback {8}{W}{W}. This spell costs {X} less to cast this way, where X is the greatest mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exchange control of two target creatures you don't control. Flashback {8}{U}{U}. This spell costs {X} less to cast this way, where X is the greatest mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent puts a creature card of their choice from their graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Flashback {8}{B}{B}. This spell costs {X} less to cast this way, where X is the greatest mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's draw step, that player draws two additional cards. At the beginning of enchanted player's end step, that player discards their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He ripped up board after board until his hands were bloody. Still, he could not find whatever it was he sought.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent sacrifices an artifact. For each artifact sacrificed this way, you create a Treasure token. Flashback {8}{R}{R}. This spell costs {X} less to cast this way, where X is the greatest mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on it. Flashback {8}{G}{G}. This spell costs {X} less to cast this way, where X is the greatest mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Whenever a Curse is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to the battlefield attached to you at the beginning of the next end step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may attach a Curse attached to you to one of your opponents. If you do, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fastest way across the dunes is above.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Outlast {1}{W} ({1}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold the line, for family and the fallen!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Angel of Glory's Rise enters the battlefield, exile all Zombies, then return all Human creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Justice isn't done until undeath is undone."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have indestructible.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as I stand, so will your cause."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Citadel Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons. • Khans - At the beginning of combat on your turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. • Dragons - At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy all creatures. • Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In their final moments, the demons gazed upon grace in its purest form.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Custodi Soulbinders enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Custodi Soulbinders: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As long as Dearly Departed is in your graveyard, each Human creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never forget our ancestors. They have not forgotten us." - Mikaeus, the Lunarch

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elite Scaleguard enters the battlefield, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.) Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Herald of War attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Angel spells and Human spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Herald of War.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy all nontoken creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who are chosen do not doubt. Those who remain do not lament.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mikaeus, the Lunarch enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mikaeus. {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mikaeus: Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Whenever Odric, Master Tactician and at least three other creatures attack, you choose which creatures block this combat and how those creatures block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fear holds no place in faith's battle plan."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control until your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov care not for repentance, only repayment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance As Riders of Gavony enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Human creatures you control have protection from creatures of the chosen type.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her paean is the clash of spears, her prayer a battle cry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each attacking creature, its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry, there's plenty for everyone." - Vickon, Eleventh Company battlemage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts - on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Eternal Skylord enters the battlefield, amass Zombies 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) Zombie tokens you control have flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My earliest work escapes me." - Stitcher Geralf

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Zombie creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile X target creature cards from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To serve as an eternal is the afterlife granted to the worthy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for Zombie creature spells you cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let those idiot priests tremble! A new era in unlife begins here and now. Oglor, raise the lightning vane!" - Stitcher Geralf

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}, {T}: Each player mills three cards. Exile up to two creature cards put into graveyards this way. Create an X/X blue Zombie creature token, where X is the total power of the cards exiled this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a Zombie you control would deal combat damage to a player, instead that player mills that many cards. Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from their library, exile that card and create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create thirteen tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens. Flashback {7}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes death comes knocking. Sometimes it tears down the walls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1. {2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Corpse Augur dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creature cards in target player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even when the flesh grows cold, knowledge waits in the bones for a master to release it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player creates X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, then up to one target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each Zombie that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Countless ghouls surged through Thraben's streets, and with them came the city's salvation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Diregraf Colossus enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card in your graveyard. Whenever you cast a Zombie spell, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player mills X cards. For each creature card put into a graveyard this way, you create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Did you have a nice nap?" - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) Whenever a Zombie token you control with power 6 or greater attacks, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {B}, Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Eater of Hope. {2}{B}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gods can be appeased. Demons, however . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is half the number of Zombies you control, rounded down.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With Thraben's army recalled to its city walls, outlying villages were left to fend for themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise." - Skyclave inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap five untapped Zombies you control: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cabal never expected its creations to create servants of their own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Mill two cards. −3: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. −7: Destroy all non-Zombie creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Zombies you control get +1/+0. At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana inspires horror in many and fanatical admiration in a few.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Zombies you control get +1/+1. When Liliana's Mastery enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are so many of them. It seems they've just been waiting for someone to serve."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Zombies you control get +1/+1. {1}{B}, {T}: All Zombies gain menace until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Curse of Wandering leaves only hatred.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Midnight Reaper deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one welcomes his visit, yet all must grant him tribute.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was a night like any other. It would soon become a night no one would ever forget.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Overseer of the Damned enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature. Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, Sacrifice a creature or planeswalker: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know they're unstoppable fighters created to harvest souls - it's just they're so rude about it." - Kaya

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other player sacrifices a creature. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Necromancers deal in commodities far more precious than gold and grain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Undead Augur or another Zombie you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To see past the veil of death, cross it." - The Red Book of Mezdrithalik

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all Zombie creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped, then destroy all Humans.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There will come a day so dark you will pray for death. On that day your prayers will be answered." - Minaldra, the Vizag Atum

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them." ―Euphemia, Nexus watcher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token, a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, and a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My battle cry reaches ears far keener than yours." - Saidah, Joraga hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To survive exceptional times we must adapt by exceptional means." - Vannifar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control dies, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the power of the creature that died.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We traffic in flesh, not souls. Still, it's a shame to let anything go to waste." - Cevraya, Golgari shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) {T}: Add {G} for each +1/+1 counter on Gyre Sage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now is the hour. Ours is the duty. For victory and family - charge!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Kessig Cagebreakers attacks, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token that's tapped and attacking for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They put bars on these noble beasts and then wonder why werewolves target our towns."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each creature you control. Ferocious - You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First, whispers of ancient days. Then, visions of things to come.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add three mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can face any danger when all of nature is on your side."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Verdurous Gearhulk enters the battlefield, distribute four +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Wild Beastmaster attacks, each other creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Wild Beastmaster's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When they covered the world in city, all they did was give themselves nowhere to run."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. {2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever another Zombie you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though its mind has long since rotted away, it wields a sword with deadly skill.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on another creature you control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Enduring Scalelord.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the sun that beats down upon Arashin's walls could shine more brightly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gisa and Geralf enters the battlefield, mill four cards. Once during each of your turns, you may cast a Zombie creature spell from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These fiends are slightly less tolerable than you." "A sentiment that warms my heart, sister."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gleaming Overseer enters the battlefield, amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) Zombie tokens you control have hexproof and menace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Lifelink When Heron's Grace Champion enters the battlefield, other Humans you control get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sigarda was the last uncorrupted archangel, but she would not have to fight alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you sacrifice a creature, target opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bring forth the dead, their skull-grins and rattle-bones. We will feast upon their wailing ghosts." - Silumgar, translated from Draconic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying You and Humans you control have hexproof. {2}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Trostani's Summoner enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance, a 3/3 green Centaur creature token, and a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The essence of night to harden the soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Inspiration is found by looking outward." - Oviya Pashiri, sage lifecrafter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The essence of wind to lift up the weary.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is great wisdom in rushing headlong into combat . . . if you're prepared." - Kenjek, captain of the Thousand Swords

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. Talisman of Dominance deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. Talisman of Unity deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {3}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Woodland: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield tapped. When Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard. {T}: Add {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.) Canopy Vista enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The continent of Murasa lies beneath a blanket of dense vegetation, its enormous branches tangled so thickly that some inhabitants never see the ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Choked Estuary enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, Choked Estuary enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Approach my tower on bended knee or depart from it as ash upon the wind." - Gadwick, the Wizened

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Murky Otarian tides hide the forgotten treacheries of the Phyrexian war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped. When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them." - Pulan, Bant orchardist

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Fortified Village enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Forest or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Fortified Village enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Krosan Verge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Krosan Verge: Search your library for a Forest card and a Plains card, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mortuary Mire enters the battlefield tapped. When Mortuary Mire enters the battlefield, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. {T}: Add {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Otaria, peace and harmony are rare. Places that provide both are cherished.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) Sunken Hollow enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On the continent of Tazeem, rushing waters plunge through narrow canyons into mist-cloaked lakes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Temple of Plenty enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Plenty enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When gods become apathetic, the people will worship anyone who answers their pleas." - Kiora

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Unclaimed Territory enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.
